name: directtalk.github.io
description: Blog de tech da Direct Talk

scripts.build: browserify assets/js/index.js > assets/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify assets/js/index.js -o assets/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ]
